attributes.action: stop the increase of university tuition fees throughout the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Universities in England and Wales wish to once again increase the fees paid by students to attend their institutions, from anything between £5000 to £20,000. It is illogic to charge a demographic with very little money so much for a service which is intrinsic to the continued stability of the country.
